FuncDef:
The ipv4-family vpn-instance command enables the BGP-VPN instance address family and displays the address family view.
The undo ipv4-family vpn-instance command deletes the configurations in the BGP-VPN instance address family. The ipv4-family vpn-instance command enables the BGP-VPN instance address family and displays the address family view. The undo ipv4-family vpn-instance command deletes the configurations in the BGP-VPN instance address family. By default, the BGP-VPN instance address family is disabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Associates a specified VPN instance with the BGP-IPv4 address family. You can enter the BGP-VPN instance address family view using the parameter.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.

ExtraInfo: Before performing BGP configurations in a BGP-VPN instance address family, you need to run the ipv4-family vpn-instance command in the BGP view to enable the BGP-VPN instance address family and enter the address family view. The configuration in this view takes effect for the IPv4 unicast routes and peers in the specified VPN instance.
